translations: n.严格；说服力；（货币）[金融] 银根紧；迫切

phrs.translation: 严密性, 迫切, 严格, 银根紧
银根收缩, 银根奇紧, 银根紧, 金融紧迫
杂交严格性, 杂交严格度
低严格度, 低严紧度

sentences.sentence: In times of financial stringency it is clear that public expenditure has to be closely scrutinized.
sentences.translation: 财政紧缩时期显然要对公共支出进行严格审查。

sentences.sentence: For all the talk of fiscal stringency, tax rises and spending cuts are only beginning to bite.
sentences.translation: 对所有关于财政紧缩的谈论而言，税赋增加和削减开支只不过是个开始。

sentences.sentence: Even at this time of fiscal stringency NHS spending has been spared from cuts for the next five years.
sentences.translation: 尽管处在财政紧张时期，国民保健制度今后五年的开销却并未因此而削减。
